comment: Obsolete version of ~ sbbi as of 24-Jul-2023. Substitution distributes over a biconditional. Version of ~ sbbi with a disjoint variable condition, not requiring ~ ax-11 nor ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 18-Jan-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
